system.description: It gains a Fly Speed equal to its Ground Speed.

effects.name: Avian
effects.description: Its Speed is increased by 1 Space (you can choose this Trait up to 5 times).

system.description: It benefits from your Skill and Trade Masteries.

effects.name: Masterful
effects.description: It benefits from your Skill and Trade Masteries.

system.description: You can spend 1 AP to cause your Familiar to become Invisible for 1 minute or until it takes any Action beside the Dodge or Hide Actions.

effects.name: Invisible
effects.description: You are Unseen, making creatures that can't see you Exposed (your Attack Checks against them have ADV) and Hindered against you (they have DisADV on Attack Checks against you).

system.description: The range of your Shared Telepathy increases to 100 Spaces, and you always know the exact location of your Familiar provided you are both on the same plane of existence.
While within 10 Spaces of your Familiar, you can cast Spells as if you were standing in its Space.

The Familiar can spend 1 AP to make an Attack Check using your Attack Check bonuses instead of its own.

The Attack has a range of 10 Spaces, and deals +1 damage if the target is within 1 Space.

Choose a damage type when you summon the familiar.

  • Elemental or Physical: The Attack targets PD and deals 2 damage.

  • Mystic: The Attack targets MD and deals 1 damage.

System Tip:Item is configured for slashing damage. You need to configure it on your own when you want to use other damage type.

AwoyhtQxnjOHWmtw.name: Attack in Melee
AwoyhtQxnjOHWmtw.description: The Attack has a range of 10 Spaces, and deals +1 damage if the target is within 1 Space.

system.description: Requires Familiar Attack. The familiar has ADV on Attacks against Bloodied creatures, and on Survival Checks to track them.
The Familiar has ADV on Stealth Checks and can attempt to Hide even when it's only Partially Concealed.
The Familiar is Immune to effects and damage you produce, unless you choose otherwise.
The Familiar can communicate telepathically with any creature it can see within 5 Spaces. If the Familiar cant speak, it communicates using only simple ideas, emotions, and images.
The Familiar doesnt provoke Opportunity Attacks when it leaves an enemys reach.
The Familiar can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
While moving at a Stealthy pace (1/2 Speed), the Familiar makes no sound, leaves no noticeable trail, and cant be tracked by mundane means.
The Familiar gains the ability to speak and knows all languages you know.
The Familiar has ADV on Saves to avoid being Charmed or Frightened (including Rattled and Intimidated).

effects.name: Strong-Willed
effects.description: The Familiar has ADV on Saves to avoid being Charmed or Frightened (including Rattled and Intimidated).

effects.name: Swift

system.description: While within 20 Spaces, you and your Familiar can speak Telepathically with each other.
While within 10 Spaces of your Familiar, you cast a Spell with a range of Touch as if you were standing in your Familiars Space.

Your Familiar shares your HP and Deaths Door Threshold. If you both take damage from the same source, you only take 1 instance of that damage. While your Familiar occupies the same Space as you, it cant be targeted by Attacks.
